strategic_pillars.name: Metabolic Leadership
strategic_pillars.description: Dominance in the GLP-1/GIP agonist market with Mounjaro (tirzepatide) and Zepbound, targeting obesity and Type 2 diabetes.

strategic_pillars.name: Neurodegeneration Pipeline
strategic_pillars.description: Donanemab for early symptomatic Alzheimer's disease represents a high-risk, high-reward blockbuster opportunity.

strategic_pillars.name: Oncology Innovation
strategic_pillars.description: Targeted therapies (Jaypirca) and acquisitions (Point Biopharma) to bolster the cancer portfolio.

ai_strategy.hardware: Investments in Isomorphic Labs and internal supercomputing clusters for protein folding simulations.
ai_strategy.software: Generative AI for small molecule discovery and automated clinical trial data processing.

regulatory_risk.description: Pricing pressure from the Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) and PBM negotiations.

supply_chain_risk.description: Manufacturing bottlenecks for incretin products (Mounjaro/Zepbound) limiting revenue realization.

clinical_risk.description: Safety profile concerns or delayed approvals for Donanemab.
